website_summaries.verdict: The best feature is an oversized 5.5-inch 2X magnification lens that allows users to see more of a crossword puzzle or book page.
pros: Three LED lights provide good illumination for nighttime use
cons: The more powerful lenses are small
Overall size may be a tad bulky for some users

customer_reviews.title: Just what Dad needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magnifying glass and sent it to my 90 year-old father who, in his later years, is beginning to lose his eyesight. I called him the day he received it, and he couldn't have been happier. It gave him just the amount of help that he needed to be able to read the print that he hadn't been able to lately. He was very happy, and so am I that this magnifier lived up to it's billing...Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Mrpapaw

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought for himself. He's like a little kid with it, showing me all that it can do. We are in our early 40's and he is starting to not be able to see small writing. He just got glasses last year and doesn't want to get new ones for at least another year. So, this is his solution and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika S.

customer_reviews.title: Working puzzles just became easier with FANCII...
customer_reviews.text: This lighted magnifier is perfect for what I needed. I use it for working jigsaw puzzles. My eyesight is not as it used to be, but I still like to do the puzzles. This one is not so heavy that it wears you out, and it will just lay on the table and wait till you need it. Thanks, Fancii. Also, the seller, thru Amazon, has been most attentive and have been offering any help I may need in case the product did not meet my expectations. Not Needed!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste If Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money. The big glass only magnifies 1X with the tiniest of lenses, set in the big lense, magnifying a bit more. You cannot read fine print through anything but the tiny lense.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: This handheld magnifying light is cheaply made..The light on it is not bright enough and it is hard to look thru the magnifier with the light cause the light does not shine very well there..And the magnifying part is not very good at all . The round circle is so small can only read a few words at a time and the lettering does not get very big and plus the cap the covers the batteries keeps coming off cause of the way you have to hold it..And the glass part gets so blurry it is so hard to clean cause all it does is streak even when using just water..Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne thomas

customer_reviews.title: and that she felt like Sherlock Holmes hold it"
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the Magnifier in mail, my wife's first reaction was "this thing is huge, and that she felt like Sherlock Holmes hold it". I am please because i can see an entire sentence when using it and I don't have to bend over to see things. It's like holding a pair of eye glasses in your hand it's that good. If I know someone that needs something like this I know who to send one to or tell what to buy.
customer_reviews.author: G Knap

customer_reviews.title: really nice is that every Fancii product comes with an 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as one of the items for my parents' 48th wedding anniversary. After they opened the gift, I did get to try it out, too. Also, really nice is that every Fancii product comes with an 18 month warranty! Also, the people with the company are extremely personable ^_~ Anyway, that it's huge works nice for viewing a large amount of area at one time. The 4x size spot is nice. The 10x spot is quite small, but very happy it's included with the magnifier. There's a tiny Bible I also gave them, and it's that 10x lens on the Fancii magnifier that can actually make it big enough to read ^_~!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I need it for work to read regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I need it for work to read regular documents. Even with glasses I have trouble seeing, so I believe this will help. I agree the areas that are meant to magnify larger are not really big enough. Wish those were much larger areas or that they could make an entire magnifyer in the higher magnification range. I do not love LED lights and I don't use them. LED lights are actually very bad for vision in the long run. Incandescent or sun light are better for your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: 10X too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who has visual problem due to brain cancer. The 10X magnifying part is so small that you need a magnifier to find it. I should have paid more attention to the details.
customer_reviews.author: Karoline

customer_reviews.title: Nice lens, but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It's probably best to order one and try it out. For me the 2x magnification is too week to read books. For you, 2x may be fine. The tiny5x and 10 x are pretty useless. If you need more magnification the 5x Magniphy LED illuminated lens may be better. There is a small 2" in diameter second glass that works really well, unlike the dime sized 5x and 10x in this lens. One tiny bulb in the Magniphy, unfortunately flickers, and the second died. This the 2x lens has three tiny bulbs and they all work. Reading a magazine or newspaper I prefer the 5x Magniphy but I am old.
customer_reviews.author: Bohdan Hodiak

customer_reviews.title: Exhausts AAA batteries quickly
customer_reviews.text: There are three different magnifying pieces integrated into one unit. The strongest lens is the smallest of the three. Would have preferred it to be larger and more useful.. So many product descriptions are so minuscule that I need a larger magnification lens.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker who has found

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this magnifying glass. It came in a box well protected. It has a cloth case as well as a cleaning cloth. As I believe one purchaser previously noted, the glass is clear and in focus side to side. The owner wants you to be 100% satisfied, and I find this initiation of customer service rare and refreshing. The only thing I noticed is that there was an odor to the cloth casing when initially taken out of the box, but when removed and aired out for a little while, this lessened to almost nothing and it doesn't bother me anymore. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Beller

customer_reviews.title: "Ah HA" so that is what it says!
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased one of these for a friend at work with vision issues. He was very pleased with it. I found myself borrowing it from time to time and decided I wanted one for myself, so I bought 2 more, one for home and one for my personal use at work. If you have reading glasses and they aren't quite doing it for you any more get one of these and when you need to read the ridiculously small fine print on almost everything these days whip out this baby and say "Ah HA" so that is what it says.
customer_reviews.author: DeployGuy

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, wide lens is clear with no distortion
customer_reviews.text: This item was well packaged and as described. I could see very well with the 2x and 4x magnification. I found the small area of the 10x not as useful. That said, I could see much better with this lens than another one I have. I love that it is lightweight and has the lighting option. The view is clear with no distortion and the wide lens means I can see more without having to move it around as much. Quite useful for reading medicine bottles in particular. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SandiewhoTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Something that will magnify very small print so you ca read it. This does not.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the magnifying glass. It did not magnify things enough for me. My sight is not that poor either. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Martin

customer_reviews.title: Provided ability to read again.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my mother. She is in her 80's and has been an avid reader all of her adult life. Now, she is having more problems with her eyes and is unhappy that reading is difficult if not impossible at worst. She has the magnifying glasses but they do not work well. This resolved the issue to her satifaction. She can read again. Came well boxed. Inserted the AAA batteries and led worked without any problem. Recommend for those who need a wider magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Z

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: The lens is plastic,scratches very easily. I tried using it in my woodworking shop. You will spend more time trying to keep from scratching it that is worth. If you plan to use it as an everyday tool buy something made out o glass. Also note it is an imported item other than USA
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Guerin sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great large magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: The older I get the harder it is to read small prints on papers or food boxes/cans. Even my glasses don’t help so I made the decision to search for a good solution. This product is of good quality, the glass is very clear without distortion. I didn’t noticed there was a light until I received a follow up email from the vendor who gave me a few more pointers. I added 3 AAA better use and it’s all good.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel1951

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra large size of this magnifing  glass.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new extra large Fancii magnifing glass, I can now read newspaper articles that I could not read before , especially on different colored paper. The LED lights are a great help, which really light up what you are reading. I am 77 and my husband is 84 and he loves it aswell, it was easy to assemble and is well made, very glad I purchased the extra large size for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Avril M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fancii 5.5 inch Extra Large LED Handheld Jumbo Magnifer
customer_reviews.text: This product is very light weight and comes with a LED light., batteries not provided. It is large enough so that it can magnify small print on bottles, newspapers and even information online. The LED light provides even more visibility. I do not even need my glasses when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T.Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use at our business for when we have to read small labels or work on small parts in our water/wastewater utility management company. It is very well built and I like the three different magnification options. It appears to be very well built for consumer use, but I think we'll have to be careful with this if we bring it out to the field.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

customer_reviews.title: This magnifier works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I received my shipment quicker than I expected, it was well packed and arrived in perfect shape. I use it to change batteries on watches, reading coins and reading tinny type. The magnifier does exactly what I bought it for at a good price. The view thru the glass is clear, the glass perfect. I would certainly recommend the magnifier to anyone with a need for one. The LED lights are strong without drawing the batteries down.
customer_reviews.author: LighteningLou

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: The smalller magnifying glasses are so frustrating because you have to constantly move them over an article to read the whole thing. I'm so happy with this LARGE magnifyer. This one is very light, because it's made of plastic. So it's easy to hold, and the light is so bright and helpful. I barely have to move it over a page while reading. And what a terrific price!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Sherlock Holmes
customer_reviews.text: These eyes are not as good as they used to be. I was in need of a magnifying glass so I could read, and I got this one. It's nice and light, with three LED lights which are so good to brighten the page. Plus there are two more magnifiers built in for when you need some bigger magnification. It comes with a cleaning cloth and a little black bag to store it in. Everything I need for reading. A good value at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Shatter

customer_reviews.title: Terrific magnifying glass with light
customer_reviews.text: Terrific magnifying glass with light. My husband likes this glass for use with his coin collection. Magnification is awesome, can see many tiny details on the item being viewed. A must have for failing eyes, just to magnify and be able to read anything which you could not previously see. A must have for collectors of stamps, coins etc. Clear, magnified version of those 'Oh so small' markings and crests on ceramics, collector items. And maybe you need it for the small print at the bottom of many binding documents.
customer_reviews.author: annazon

customer_reviews.title: Generous viewing area with added bonus of L.E.D. lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 88yr old dad. He suffered a stroke which left him with some vision impairment. The L.E.D. feature was most attractive along with the generous viewing size. Since it does not come with batteries I separately bought some AAA batteries and thankfully they were all shipped together for my dad. My mom put it together for him and called me to tell me how delighted he was and that with the light feature he could "see" much easier what he was reading.
customer_reviews.author: Fireball

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my house hold.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome magnifying glass. It has a light to help you see the small print and is a great benefit for these old eyes. I have three of them so I do not have to search far to find it. It is a must for my household. I can now see "fine" print. Medicine bottle were the worst but now I can see the instructions clearly. Safer for me and my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value but: The 3 led lights are a valuable feature but don't do a good job at dispersing the light evenly. Still, I very much like having them. The size is good and having the 3x insert is excellent. The weight is almost but not quite too much - I go back and forth on that. For a right-hander, the light switch should be on the other side, but I guess that would be too expensive to have two models at this price.
customer_reviews.author: William Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: 'Gooder than taters
customer_reviews.text: This Fancii 5.5 in Handheld is just what I wanted. Large enough to see reading materials. Sturdy and well built. LED lights add much help. Have I mentioned good price. Had been using a WalMart 5 in glass no LED lights that cost about same. I am very, very pleased with this Fancii handheld light.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Teriffic Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have macular degeneration, and, as my order history will attest, I have trad nearly all of the many and improving products designed for this condition. This Fancii 5.5 inch LED Handheld is, by far, the best, especially from an ergonomic standpoint. It covers nearly a full page of most publications, and completely covers all newspaper columns, while being extremely easy to manipulate with your free hand. I love it, and rely on it nearly always. I'll probably be ordering a second one, so that I'll have one available for travel or elsewhere at home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Gerber, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The LED is bright and even but the switch started to malfunction after a few weeks. The magnification appeared suspect. I ended up buying a magnifier that was significantly more expensive but the new magnifier is simply superior. I guess with optics you get what you pay for. This magnifier is good to have as a backup, but did not stand up to be my primary daily magnifier..
customer_reviews.author: tmy

customer_reviews.title: Peel the lens protector off, dummy!
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. I thought it really sucked when I took off the plastic protector....until I found there was a plastic protector on both sides. good magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Freaque du Cinema

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Pros for me 1. Well made with good materials. 2. Lightweight 3. Handle is a comfortable size. 4. LED lights are bright. 5. Large viewing area. Cons for me: 1. I wish the magnification was one step stronger in the large area and I could do without the small magnification dot in that area also. 2. The light button could be higher on the handle. I turn it on by accident quite frequently. Overall I can recommend this product. I will use it often. I will also be looking for one similar with stronger magnification overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for Low Vision
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this magnifier as it allows you to read larger areas. The three different magnifications are wonderful—larger portion of magnifier is 2X, little circle inside larger area is 4X, and handle has small circle which is 10X. I paid approximately $80 for an Optelec magnifier, smaller in size with 2.5X magnification. This runs all over it! And what a great price!
customer_reviews.author: WSNHB

customer_reviews.title: This has been one of the best purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases I have made. I reviewed many different products and my decision was based on the description of what the seller listed which met my needs. It's exactly what I need for my job! Powerful magnifying and lighting to make seeing easier. Then to make this purchase even better, the owner sends me an email asking if I was happy, if I had any questions, if his product was in good working order and if I had any issues at all, he would be happy to fix it. Thank you John with Fancii...great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: Plus: The large 2x lense is quite amazing, covering more area than I expected. Both smaller lenses (4x, 10x) magnification is amazing too. The LED light is consistently illuminating the entire 2x area. (Not really) Cons: I wish the 4x and 10x lense would be larger and the 2x lense would be a 2.5x.
customer_reviews.author: Joachim Scholz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great magnifier for baby boomers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this magnifier! It's lightweight,and easy to hold, and has a light you can turn on for additional illumination. I use it to read magazines, or books with small print. I highly recommend it to anyone with aging eyes that can't see up close very well. As a bonus, it even came with batteries installed, so it was ready to go right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HELP FOR OLD FOLKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and it was love at first sight for her. We are both 82 but her eyesight is failing faster than mine. This great tool will make her trips to change her glasses less frequent. The light is a bonus and she was delighted when she first picked it up and turned it on. One thing I would suggest is that you include the batteries. Your ability to buy them in volume would add very little to your cost and I am certain that a slight raise in price would not be a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M. Shuford

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, but with flaw
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is well built, a quality product Its large lens views well from all angles across its full width. BUT, two issues detract from its usefulness. The 2X power rating is substantially overrated. It is barely more than 1X. It is not enough to be a general aid for someone who needs larger type on an ongoing basis. The second issue is that the lights do not give afull coverage of the viewed image.
customer_reviews.author: Whitby K Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Magnifying Glass and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a very nice magnifying glass. I loved that it came with a cloth bag to store it in and a cloth to clean it with. It is very light weight, easy to hold and the fact that it is lighted is a definite plus. However, the magnification was not as powerful as I needed. I contacted the company and they were wonderful. I would definitely purchase items from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ibeasheep

customer_reviews.title: The magnifying part works great, though
customer_reviews.text: The battery cover does not stay on. This makes it difficult to use. I have to use tape to keep it on and who wants to have to rely on tape for a brand new product to work correctly. The magnifying part works great, though. The small magnifier that is strongest is actually too little for me to really use.
customer_reviews.author: amy Eisner

customer_reviews.title: Big Lens Makes It Worth It.
customer_reviews.text: Very big lens makes this magnifier worth the buy but the light is not as bright as you would expect. I use it for seeing numbers on color-by-number books so it's difficult at time to have to hold it with one hand and color with the other. It's great for reading the paper or small print, however. But if the lights were arranged around the lens instead of just at the handle, that would probably take care of the lighting situation. Just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: Bryleighs Chichi

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because the X4 and the X10 magnification are two small lenses. X2 is large but that isn't really good amplification. Wish the X4 was larger. The light and handle are great but be careful if you are looking for better magnification for reading and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Raynman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item. Received within 2 days. Very well made. Easy to handle, lite weight, great size, 3 excellent magnifications, LED lighting, includes lens cleaning cloth, drawstring storage pouch, easy to read instruction manual and reasonably priced. An exceptional buy!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Ok - could he sturdier and brighter
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy and the light sure could be brighter but I like how the higher magnification is on the right side of the large lens v having to use that tiny circle magnifier in the handle. Battery cover comes off super easy and it’s fairly heavy so if you’re ordering for the elderly as I did take that into account.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive Magnificafion
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced this with another magnifying glass that actually does what it is supposed to do. Although some magnification does occur when one holds the glass far away from the item being examined, it just isn't that impressive particularly given its large size.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: It's alright for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was for my mom who has vision problems. The main lens is 2X which didn't help her, the smaller lens inside the big one is 4X which was fine but it's pretty small, and the lens in the handle is 10X but it's so small it's pointless to try and use. Also, the small 10X lens in the handle made everything look backwards or upside down, so it must have been put it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: After three months lights will not work
customer_reviews.text: Light stays on. Large size means you are not constantly moving the magnifier. Update after three months. The feature (light stays on) has turned out to be a negative killing batteries and lights in the cloth case. Now new batteries will not help. My review is altered to DON’T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: vernon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have macular degeneration and having a large magnifying glass like this helps me in reading. It is well worth the cost. Imay end up buying another one. It is light weight and comfortable to hold. It would have been nice if the lighting went all the way around the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Martin

customer_reviews.title: 5.5 inch magnifier and much more!
customer_reviews.text: Jumbo it is and useful it is! Great innovation. Aside from the huge viewing space there are 2 furthger spots with even greater magnification. It also has lights which are great for reading in bed or in a liight challenged room. I have found it a very useful tool for reading and model making. I may pick up a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Rogzombie

customer_reviews.title: Admit you need this and you will be so happy you did!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as I continued to have to read smaller and smaller print on many things: prescription bottles, cd jackets etc. I love the long handle which makes it easy to hold or plant somewhere while you read. It's light and easy to handle! The fact that it has LED lighting is a bonus but not critical if you read in decent lighting. I had trouble opening the handle to install the batteries but my friend turned it upside down and it popped right open. I would highlight the fact that batteries are not included but it was clear to me that they would be needed. I would highly recommend this project.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I can see a whole paragraph at the same time. This makes reading much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I have this magnifying glass. I was using it to read the newspaper when I was prompted to write a review. Because of its size, I can see a whole paragraph of a book or newspaper. This makes reading much easier for me. The magnifying glass comes with a cleaning cloth and a protective bag. They are nice to have too. I had a little trouble stuffing the three AAA batteries into the handle but that's a small point. I'm glad I have this magnifying glass. I might buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busa

customer_reviews.title: Glass lens is better--this is not high quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a multi-use magnifying glass because it was larger and I figured it would be my go-to utensil for this purpose. However, my smaller glass magnifying glass provides a much clearer enlargement. I would not personally recommend. I returned item.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: I like the large area that it magnifies and the options ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the large area that it magnifies and the options of 3 different magnification. I use it for reading and my husband is using it for tying his fishing lures & hooks etc and he also he really likes it. Thank you very much. The bag you sent to keep it in is very nice so the glass doesn't get scratched. Thank you very much for this product.
customer_reviews.author: CleanBookReader

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: My mom has a hard time seeing anything small, so I picked this out for her and she LOVES it. It works great. Im thinking I need to order another one for me. Its light weight and magnifies so good and I love the light feature. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Letter size stays the same.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this magnifier. The size, light, and weight is nice, but it does not magnify the letters. Only lights them up. Would not recommend if you need magnification.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Take Care When Handling (Fancii 5.5 inch Extra Large LED Handheld MG w/Light)
customer_reviews.text: The light switch is feather touch. This means that even slightly brushing against it turns it on. When in the cover that comes with it you can not only inadvertently turn it on but you cannot even see that it is on. Laying it down on the desk face down will get the same result. The switch needs to make a "clicking" sound and have a noticeable feel when it is switched on. That would save many a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Stoccado

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT MAGNIFIER
customer_reviews.text: I had an eye problem and needed something to help with reading until my eye was okay after surgery. I love the magnifier including the light and would highly recommend it to anyne out there who needs good magnifier. Now I can even read the maps in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size to see whatever you need to see and ...
customer_reviews.text: As my eyes aren't what they used to be, I find this comes in very handy. It's a great size to see whatever you need to see and the LED lights make a huge difference. The small spot with extra magnification really helps with that super tiny print on everything you buy not meant for human eyes no matter how good they are. It's nice to actually read what's in that bottle of...whatever if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Working Woman

customer_reviews.title: Very clear awesome, the light is a added plus
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my husband for Christmas in his stocking. He did not seem interested but then he was putting in the batteries. We are planning a trip and the map is on the table. All he can say is this thing is great, I could not plan without it. Then he said put this where I can always find it. It was a hit
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for card collectors
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my dad. At first, he was kind of eh about it. The moment he used it, he was stastic! He could see the super small print on these trading cards that his basic magnifying glass couldn't see.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy2012

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight
customer_reviews.text: I had another one my mom used but she said it weighed too much for prolonged use. This one weighs well in her hands but doesn't have lights that go all around the glass like the other did. The light is only by the handle, which is a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Sucks badly. The light doesn’t work, the “jewelers loup” 10 X magnifier is too small to be of any use and distorts the tiny little area it covers so you can’t see it at all and the large lens doesn’t seem to be even a 2X magnification. More like 10% magnification. Sending it back, $16 is too much to throw away on a piece of overpriced junk. Unbelievable. What a rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: bluemoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice big magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice big magnifying glass, the light works well and really helps. It takes 3 AAA batteries that are not included and the battery cover is difficult to open. Over all I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S.

customer_reviews.title: Got two different types & this one was the best. White color which is easier to located then ...
customer_reviews.text: Got two different types & this one was the best. White color which is easier to located then the black from the other company. Best of all really lite weight which is easier to hold & use for longer times, the other company was way to heavy. Great with or without the light but really amazing with the light on. You got to try this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product, especially its "jumbo" size, should work well for my elderly mother, whose vision is deteriorating. More importantly, however, it was a pleasure dealing with Fancii's customer service about this and a related product. They responded to my questions promptly, both by email and telephone, which was sincerely appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my 11 yr old grandson along with a magnetic globe! He loved it and of course can use it for many other purposes! Good quality, versatile and good value! Highlly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful Product
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is just what my 98 yr old Dad needed. He is an avid crossword solver and this lighted magnifier makes it easier for him. He liked it so much, that I purchased another magnifier, so he would have it,where he needs it, on both levels of his home. On his behahalf, I fully recommend this product. I may have to order another for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keep having issues with Fancii magnifying glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these for my elderly mother over the years. The glass lens have fallen out of some of them and on the last one I purchased, the battery cover won't stay on. So I put a rubber band on it and hope it will keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: TNCAT

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT and the BEST HELPER for problematic eyes
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier with its lights, very comfortable handle, and incredible magnification(higher-and yet higher)on the outer rim, is also very light and easy to use. I bought it for my brother (and had to mail it). So, when I talked to him he was so excited having received it because having problems with his eyes THIS is his fast friend and tremendous helper!
customer_reviews.author: Effie F.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't magnify
customer_reviews.text: This 'magnifying' glass is so weak it doesn't help at all! Size is so large that I find this product ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Berge

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear lighted glass
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear glass and has 3 different magnifications for that annoying fine print. As a nurse I frequently come across patients who have difficulty reading. If you or a loved one need a magnifying glass this one is a great choice due to it's size. Makes reading a breeze. It works great if you need to tighten those tiny screws on your glasses. You don't have to hold the button down for the LEF light, just flick it on and you can hold the glass comfortably.. Will have to see how long it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Robneve

customer_reviews.title: good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier surprised me with the quality of build and the quality of image. The LEDs are bright enough to illuminate whatever you want to see.
customer_reviews.author: tony hallen

customer_reviews.title: This Product is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magnifying glass I have ever had. I really only use the large magnifier but I like that the diameter is just the right size. I was worried that it wouldn't be as big as I wanted. Once I started using it, I found the large magnifier was the perfect size. I was worried it might be too heavy but it's very light and I like that too. Usually I only use it for a few seconds or a minute or two but it's not heavy to hold..I really love this magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This handheld magnifying glass is the best one I've had. It's large, easy to hold and has a total of three different lenses. The large one and two smaller ones for detail. I would totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hancock

customer_reviews.title: A magnifier that's a good buy...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality, lightweight handheld, nice size, etc. The only thing I do not like are the little circular magnifying lens, I wish they were a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find in the brick and mortars.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is nice to find a handheld magnifier that gives a clean view with no distortion. The size and lightweight, with the built in LED's make it easy to hold and position. So far the magnifier works great for the amount of money invested...Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Much easier to read books with than the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I ordered two different ones and this one was the best. It comes with a carry /protection bag, optical cloth for cleaning and booklet. The other one did not have the protection bag or booklet.
customer_reviews.author: OLD STUDENT

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: A really nice magnifying glass with three strengths to tackle just about any job. The built in light is very effective in lighting up the object. I HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Holscott

customer_reviews.title: Best magnifying glass!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As I stated in the title, this is an amazing magnifying glass. I love the large area it covers and yet is light weight. I have been looking for years for one like this. It’s perfect for any use, especially when you want to see a larger area at once. It’s very clear, as well. Can’t go wrong with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Bowen Hickle

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: For those needing a larger magnifier to read, this is amazing. I had a smaller magnifier, which was inadequate to easily read print magazines. This has a larger circumference & comes with a cleaning cloth and fabric case. I am very impressed with its' quality and anxious to catch up on my magazines!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Orme

customer_reviews.title: I really like the large viewing size
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, overall I would have rate 4stars. I really like the large viewing size, that's 5, concerned about the battery compartment seemed fragile to me, rate it 3 stars. It creaks a lot as the frame is plastic, my concern is longevity, I would rate durability 4 stars. Customer service is excellent and have been assure by the company if I have any issue they would addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Demchok

customer_reviews.title: Best Magnifying Glass I've Had
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new Fancii Magnifying Glass. It's large enough for me to see better. Love the lights if I'm reading at night. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very suitable for reading books
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a magnifying glass for reading until yesterday, but wish I had started sooner. Due to complications after cataract surgery 9 months ago, I am unable to see any detail with my left eye. So I’m relying on monovision and my right eye to see anything close up. It’s exhausting! I love to read, and this magnifying glass makes it an enjoyable activity again.
customer_reviews.author: Michie O'Day

customer_reviews.title: Seeing Again in Wesley Chapel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 91 year old mother who was having a hard time reading newspaper. Received this glass and it is large and the light gives her the extra she needed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: djr

customer_reviews.title: I can not begin to tell you how wonderful the lighted Jumbo Handheld Magnifier
customer_reviews.text: I can not begin to tell you how wonderful the lighted Jumbo Handheld Magnifier. And the shipping was SO fast - we will be back and we will spread the word! Thanks so very much! Denise
customer_reviews.author: last hope

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Magnifier
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Batteries located in handle, easy to install. Simple works the best. Don't forget to peel off protective film on both sides of the glass...
customer_reviews.author: quigby65

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom with low vision. The magnification wasn't great enough for her so I got the 3X plus 5X version, which was perfect. I like this 5.5" one so much that I may keep it for myself. On both, the image is very clear and the light is bright. The handles are comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: This is PERFECT, exactly what I was looking for to help ...
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT, exactly what I was looking for to help these tired old eyes read the fine print. I like the LED lights. It comes with a cloth carry bag and handy cleaning cloth. Very nice seller, good communication and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Big help
customer_reviews.text: This helps not only the elderly see the small print but, everyone. Micro print on medicine bottles is absurd. This helps bunches.
customer_reviews.author: Sulldino

customer_reviews.title: It's good to see everything!
customer_reviews.text: The large part of the glass is easy to use, and the small glass inserted into the large glass works well. BUT forget the magnifier on the handle because it is upside down. I saw that in the reviews but purchased it anyway because the others serve my purpose. The lighting works very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jean

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use. Decent light.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy very detailed big jigsaw puzzles. The one I'm working on now it's like a bird poster with tiny numbers beside each bird so I can look them up on my iPhone app. Intense puzzle and numbers are so small that I can barely read them. This is exactly what I needed for my jigsaw puzzle work!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 dim lights. Not bright enough to realize they're even on.
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 tiny lights, so it didn't carry the expected effect. Too dim. If for someone who has macular degeneration, this isn't the one.
customer_reviews.author: Ratings from a Real Person

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glass for a friend w/ failing eyesight, and she loves it. she has ordered a second one to keep in her kitchen . She's an avid reader, and can see the pages more clearly now. Thank you for a good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I took my first one over to show my 92 year old wonderful Aunt Pat
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I took my first one over to show my 92 year old wonderful Aunt Pat. She loved it so I had to give it up. But I liked it too. So I bought another. The next one came with a handy cloth bag and cleaning cloth. I will have to get one for my aunt's glass. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my aging eyes in a world with tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my aging eyes in a world with tiny print. The glass is lightweight and I love the storage bag, too. I've been wanting something to keep on hand when I'm reading, clipping coupons or solving crossword puzzles. It's great to use with my computer screen. Thanks for such an affordable product!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnifier
customer_reviews.text: Even without the built-in light, this device is just the trick for reading fine print. We use 2X for everything, but I can see where the added 4x and 10x spots could come in handy for something really tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Executive and Mom

customer_reviews.title: I am keeping the product because I threw away the box and do find it useful for enhancing the copy on my computer screen
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described, however it does not fulfill my needs. The 2x power is not sufficient for my eyes and the 4x power is too small for normal reading. I am keeping the product because I threw away the box and do find it useful for enhancing the copy on my computer screen. Am sorry the large magnifier isn't 3x or 4x..
customer_reviews.author: Big Irv

customer_reviews.title: Wanting another one
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it! Got on line to order more but no longer available. Oh no! Because I already did the research and this was my favorite, I just won't order more. Disappointing because we wanted one for each car glove compartment as well as one for in each bedstead. Now hubby and I will just share this one. Will Amazon tell us when they figure out if these will ever be available again? Willing to wait patiently, but would like to know for how long.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 92 year old Grandmother with macular degeneration. She needed something with which to read her mail. She loves it and is grateful for the size. Works very well, would recommend to anyone needing a quality magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Boys

product_meta.title: Fancii 5.5 inch Extra Large LED Handheld Magnifying Glass with Light - 2X 4X 10X Lens - Best Jumbo Size Illuminated Reading Magnifier for Books, Newspapers, Maps, Coins, Jewelry, Hobbies & Crafts
product_meta.description:
High Quality Magnifying Glass 
Made with scratch resistant, shatterproof clear optical grade lenses designed for seniors, students, professionals, people with low vision and macular degeneration. 

Optical Clarity With Maximum View 
The jumbo size 5.5 inch (138mm) 2X magnifying glass is ideal for reading books, newspapers, and maps, while the 4X auxiliary lens is perfect for examining fine prints and images. The 10X loupe is suitable for jewelry appraisal, circuit boards, coins, stamps, gems and antiques. 

Perfect For Your Home, Office or Workshop 
Portable and tough enough to take with you wherever you go. The durable construction of the lens and sturdy handle means even kids can use it safely for science experiments. 

Bring It On A Trip 
Comes with a lens cleaning cloth and a soft velvet storage pouch for extra protection. 

Illuminate While You Magnify 
Equipped with three energy-efficient LED lights built in the handle. The lights provide an evenly lit viewing area, perfect for nighttime book reading and use in low light applications. The lights run on three AAA batteries, which can last for weeks. 

FEATURES: 
5.5 inch (138mm) primary lens: 2X zoom 
2X lens focal length: 5.5" 
1 inch (25mm) auxiliary lens: 4X zoom 
4X lens focal length: 2.8" 
0.8 inch (20mm) loupe: 10X zoom 
10X lens focal length: 1" 
3 bright LED lights 
Velvet pouch
Lens cleaning cloth
Powered by three AAA batteries (not included) 
Can be used as a flashlight 

✔ Backed by a 100% No-Hassle, RISK FREE Money Back Guarantee! If you are not completely satisfied with our magnifying glasses, we will give you a full refund. No questions asked. 


Click the Add to Cart Button at the Top of this Page to start improving your vision today!
feature_bullets: ✔ JUMBO SIZE VIEW - 5.5 inch oversized handheld magnifying glass with 2X, 4X and 10X scratch-resistant high power lens
✔ OPTICAL GRADE LENS - Clear distortion-free magnifying lens with comfortable ergonomic handle suitable for children, adults, seniors, hobbyists and professionals
✔ HIGH CLARITY - Ideal for viewing fine details in books, newspapers, magazines, maps, electronics, miniatures, jewelry, pill bottles, hobbies and crafts.
✔ LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN - Weight is evenly distributed. At 5.8 oz, it's lightest LED magnifier for its size. No more arm fatigue just from holding!
✔ SUPER BRIGHT LED LIGHTS - 3 Built-in energy-efficient LED lights; turn ON/OFF with a simple button switch (Batteries not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,839 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
